amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike section 928, relating to removal of authority to regulate small-dollar credit.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 201 printed in House Report 115-297 to strike section 928, relating to removal of authority to regulate small-dollar credit.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ellison amendment (A165) Failed by recorded vote: 186 - 221 (Roll no. 523).
